title: The Pogo Stepmother Goose
description: Softcover wraps book written and illustrated by Walt Kelly in 1954 and inspired by his Okefenokee Company of characters. 1st verse dedicated to Lewis Carroll. 2 page Afterword dedicated to Charles Dodgson. Published by Simon and Schuster New York. Dimensions are 9-1/2" x 6-1/2"
author: Walt Kelly
